columns.name: full_name
columns.description: The full name of the primary contact address.

columns.name: address_line_1
columns.description: The first line of the primary contact address

columns.name: address_line_2
columns.description: The second line of the primary contact address, if any.

columns.name: address_line_3
columns.description: The third line of the primary contact address, if any.

columns.name: company_name
columns.description: The name of the company associated with the primary contact information, if any.

columns.name: city
columns.description: The city of the primary contact address.

columns.name: country_code
columns.description: The ISO-3166 two-letter country code for the primary contact address.

columns.name: district_or_county
columns.description: The district or county of the primary contact address, if any.

columns.name: phone_number
columns.description: The phone number of the primary contact information. The number will be validated and, in some countries, checked for activation.

columns.name: postal_code
columns.description: The postal code of the primary contact address.

columns.name: state_or_region
columns.description: The state or region of the primary contact address. This field is required in selected countries.

columns.name: website_url
columns.description: The URL of the website associated with the primary contact information, if any.

columns.name: linked_account_id
columns.description: Account ID to get contact details for.
